TI_DOC.P: EBGU - DELPROJEKT VEDRØRENDE GRCF CHISINAUS BYGNINGER (MD-Chisinau)

CONTENTS.P: Project name: GRCF CHISINAU BUILDINGS SUB-PROJECT
Country: Moldova
Business sector: Municipal and environmental infrastructure
Project ID: 47899
Funding source: EBRD, EIB and E5P grant
Type of contract: Works, Goods, Services
Type of notice: General Procurement Notice
Issue date: 16.2.2018
Closing date: 16.2.2019 23:59

Chisinau Municipality intends using the proceeds of the loans from the European Bank for Reconstruction and Development (EBRD), the European Investment Bank (EIB) and E5P Grant toward the investments in the Green City Framework: Chisinau buildings Project. The proposed project, which has a total estimated cost of 25 000 000 EUR equivalent, will require the procurement of the following goods, works and services:
— Energy efficiency audit services,
— Design and energy efficiency refurbishment of buildings through energy performance contracts,
— Supervision services.
Selection for the energy efficiency audit services will start in the first quarter 2018. Tendering for other components is planned for the second quarter 2018.

Contracts to be financed with the proceeds of the loans will be subject to the EBRD's Procurement Policies and Rules and will be open to firms from any country. The proceeds of these loans will not be used for the purposes of any payment to persons or entities, or for any import of goods, if such payment or import is prohibited by a decision of the United Nations Security Council taken under Chapter VII of the Charter of the United Nations or under a law of official regulation of the Purchaser's country.
Interested suppliers, contractors and consultants should contact:

ADDRESS_NOT_STRUCT.BLK_BTX: , Moldova. MD 2012, Republic of Moldova. Tel:

TI_DOC.P: BERŻ - SOTTOPROĠETT TAL-BINI TA' GRCF CHISINAU (MD-Chisinau)

CONTENTS.P: Project name: GRCF CHISINAU BUILDINGS SUB-PROJECT
Country: Moldova
Business sector: Municipal and environmental infrastructure
Project ID: 47899
Funding source: EBRD, EIB and E5P grant
Type of contract: Works, Goods, Services
Type of notice: General Procurement Notice
Issue date: 16.2.2018
Closing date: 16.2.2019 23:59

Chisinau Municipality intends using the proceeds of the loans from the European Bank for Reconstruction and Development (EBRD), the European Investment Bank (EIB) and E5P Grant toward the investments in the Green City Framework: Chisinau buildings Project. The proposed project, which has a total estimated cost of 25 000 000 EUR equivalent, will require the procurement of the following goods, works and services:
— Energy efficiency audit services,
— Design and energy efficiency refurbishment of buildings through energy performance contracts,
— Supervision services.
Selection for the energy efficiency audit services will start in the first quarter 2018. Tendering for other components is planned for the second quarter 2018.

Contracts to be financed with the proceeds of the loans will be subject to the EBRD's Procurement Policies and Rules and will be open to firms from any country. The proceeds of these loans will not be used for the purposes of any payment to persons or entities, or for any import of goods, if such payment or import is prohibited by a decision of the United Nations Security Council taken under Chapter VII of the Charter of the United Nations or under a law of official regulation of the Purchaser's country.
Interested suppliers, contractors and consultants should contact:

ADDRESS_NOT_STRUCT.BLK_BTX: , Moldova. MD 2012, Republic of Moldova. Tel:
